title: Matching bases
text: $$\log_{3}\left(x^2\right)$$ and $$\log_{3}\left(x^2\right)$$ have the same log base, so $$x^2=36$$.
speech: the log base 3 of, parentheses x squared   and , the log base 3 of, parentheses x squared   have the same log base, so  x squared is equal to 36 .

title: Value of $$b$$ in $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$
text: $$x^2=36$$ $$x=6$$ or $$x=-6$$. Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, $$b$$ can not be negative. Therefore we can omit the negative answer. $$x=6$$ is the only solution for the given equation.
